original_text: That wall will break into pieces, like the pieces of a pot. It will be completely broken so that it is all useless. There will be no piece that is big enough to carry coal from a fire, or water from a well.’ That wall will break into pieces, like the pieces of a pot. It will be completely broken so that it is all useless. There will be no piece that is big enough to carry coal from a fire, or water from a well.’
korean_text: 그가 이 나라를 무너뜨리시되 토기장이가 그릇을 깨뜨림 같이 아낌이 없이 부수시리니 그 조각 중에서, 아궁이에서 불을 붙이거나 물 웅덩이에서 물을 뜰 것도 얻지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: That wall will break into pieces
like the pieces of a pot
so that it is all useless
There will be no piece that is big enough
to carry coal from a fire
